name: haflow
description: Local-first orchestrator for AI-assisted missions with human gates and ephemeral sandboxes
author: oxedom

scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @haflow/shared build && pnpm --filter @haflow/backend build && pnpm --filter @haflow/frontend build && pnpm --filter @haflow/cli build && pnpm --filter site build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @haflow/backend test && pnpm --filter @haflow/cli test && pnpm --filter @haflow/frontend test:e2e
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm --filter @haflow/shared build && pnpm --filter @haflow/backend build && pnpm --filter @haflow/frontend build
